bike.description: Alpha™ SL Aluminum combines superlight performance with a comfortable, upright riding position.

components.description: RockShox Metro Mag, single coil, adjustable preload, integrated boots, magnesium lowers, 50mm travel

Bontrager Select: Paired Spoke Technology™; Torque sharing super-stiff rear hub; Semi-deep front rim is aero yet forgiving; Rear rim w/OSB improves lateral rigidity, prolongs wheel life; Double butted 14/15 DT spokes; Cro-Moly skewers; 835 g, 20h fr
AHS 1-1/8" alloy cups, semi cartridge, sealed
